summary: This document is an email forwarding a voice message attachment, sent on August 8, 2019, to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victim notification address. The email was sent the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to US Attorney's Office
events.description: An email was sent to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victim notification address, forwarding a voice message attachment.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 8, 2019, sent to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victim notification address.
The email contains an attached voice message file named '20190808 142940.wav'.
The email was sent the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in federal custody on August 7, 2019, suggesting it may contain victim or witness communication related to the case.
